description: Make the most of pineapple offcuts with this pineapple juice recipe. Blitz the peel and core with water until smooth, then simply strain, serve and sip.
keywords: Juice,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Summer,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pineapple Peel & Core Juice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sprig mint, small sprigs picked (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Peel, core and roughly chop pineapple. Reserve pineapple flesh for another use.

Place pineapple peel, core and 1 cup water in a blender and blitz until smooth and combined. Strain mixture through a fine sieve into a jug, pressing pulp with the back of a spoon until all the juice has been extracted. Halffill 4 x 1-cup capacity glasses with crushed ice. Divide pineapple mixture among glasses. Top each with a mint sprig and serve.
